preface.title: Foreword: ${project.version}
preface.para: This is an initial pre-alpha for the Maven Cookbook. I hate to call this a book at the moment: one chapter, a cover, and a copyright statement is more a pamphlet than a book. But, everything has to have a beginning, and (in the interest of openness) why not distribute the information as it appears, chapter by chapter. Enjoy, and if you want us to write about something specific, just ask. We're continuing to take requests.

section.title: Revision History
section.para: Many readers have been asking us to keep track of specific changes to the book content, the following sections list changes made to the book in reverse chronological order starting with ${project.version}.

section.title: Changes in Edition 0.1
section.para: The following changes were introduced in Edition 0.1:
